author: vmassol
msg: Renamed TestAbstractTestCaseInterceptorTestCase to AbstractTestAbstractTestCase to give a more consistent naming and clearly show that this class is not a test class that can be run (it is abstract)

author: vmassol
msg: Improved version definition. We can now have both the short form (12 or 13) and the full form (1.2 and 1.3) and only define the version once...

author: vmassol
msg: - Moved dependency to J2EE jar instead of servlet jar. We had to do it one day I guess. The drawback is that Maven cannot redistribute the Sun j2ee jar so users will need to download it manually and install it in their local repository
- Make it work both for J2EE API 1.2 and 1.3
